snippet: The statistics from the Labor Department suggest that the jobs market is steadily improving, even if some business owners remain cautious.
abstract: Labor Dept report finds job openings urged 3.4 percent to 14-year high of 5.1 million in February; could signal rebound in hiring following weak March jobs report.
lead_paragraph: The statistics from the Labor Department suggest that the jobs market is steadily improving, even if some business owners remain cautious.

headline.main: Report Shows Job Openings Are Up, but Hiring Slows
headline.print_headline: Business Briefing; Surging Job Openings Suggest a Brightening Labor Market
